How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

The ideal solution for TreasuryConnect will be a unified ServiceNow workflow platform that connects Treasury, Finance, and Banking operations in real time. The goal is to automate cashflow visibility, bank instruction processing, and payment approvals while eliminating delays caused by manual reconciliation, paper-based processes, and fragmented ERP integrations.

Through ServiceNow’s App Engine, we can design a custom Treasury Management Portal that automates the following:

Payment Instruction Workflows – Digital approval routing using Flow Designer and Service Catalog Requests for fund transfers, FX purchases, and supplier settlements.

Cashflow Monitoring Dashboard – Using Performance Analytics and Reporting to visualize inflows, outflows, and bank balances in real time.

ERP & Bank Integration Layer – Leveraging IntegrationHub and Spokes (such as REST, SAP, Oracle, or Microsoft Dynamics spokes) to connect ServiceNow with existing ERP and banking systems.

ServiceNow Capabilities Used

App Engine Studio – to design and deploy TreasuryConnect as a custom application.

Flow Designer & IntegrationHub – for workflow automation and ERP/bank system integrations.

Performance Analytics – for real-time cashflow dashboards and reporting.

GRC – for compliance, approval traceability, and audit readiness.

Virtual Agent – for quick cashflow and payment updates through chat.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

The key technical dependencies revolve around integration, security, and data alignment between ServiceNow, ERP systems, and banks. Once established, these connections will enable TreasuryConnect to deliver accurate, automated, and auditable treasury operations. 

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

The main challenges will center around integration complexity, data security, and organizational adoption. However, with a phased rollout, stakeholder collaboration, and the flexible capabilities of ServiceNow (IntegrationHub, Flow Designer, and Performance Analytics), these challenges can be effectively managed.
